vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Israel before the Monarchy, first mentioned at Jdg.13.2;
father of: Samson (H8123)
§ Manoah = "rest"
a Danite, father of the judge Samson and inhabitant of Zorah
vocabInfos._es_Definition: (1)   lugar de descanso; (2)   padre del juez Sansón
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
瑪挪亞 这个陽性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "安歇"
一位住在瑣拉的但支派的人, 士師參孫的父親
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
玛挪亚 这个阳性专有名词在原文的意思是 "安歇"
一位住在琐拉的但支派的人, 士师参孙的父亲
